ro.isdc.wro.http.support
Class RedirectedStreamServletResponseWrapper

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.ServletResponseWrapper
      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponseWrapper
          ro.isdc.wro.http.support.RedirectedStreamServletResponseWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, javax.servlet.ServletResponse
public class RedirectedStreamServletResponseWrapper
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponseWrapper

A specialized HttpServletResponseWrapper responsible for streaming response to provided OutputStream.

Since:
1.4.5
Author:
Alex Objelean

sendRedirect

public void sendRedirect(String location)
                  throws IOException
By default, redirect does not allow writing to output stream its content. In order to support this use-case, we need to open a new connection and read the content manually.

Specified by:
sendRedirect in interface javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse
Overrides:
